title: Quarterly Business Review (QBR)
realMeeting: STCA Monthly Extended PLT + Managers  (180 attendees)
prompt:
I have an upcoming Quarterly Business Review titled "STCA Monthly Extended PLT + Managers " scheduled for August 01, 2025. This is a high-complexity meeting with 180 attendees that typically requires 45 days of preparation time.

Can you help me create a detailed workback plan that includes:
1. All key milestones leading up to the meeting
2. Specific tasks with owners and deadlines
3. Dependencies between tasks
4. Critical path activities
5. Risk mitigation strategies

Please consider:
- The meeting requires coordination across multiple teams
- There are likely dependencies on deliverables and approvals
- We need to ensure adequate time for review cycles
- Executive-level stakeholders will be involved

Generate a comprehensive workback plan that ensures successful meeting preparation.

title: Workshop/Training
realMeeting: Agentic Memory Workshop – Modular, Portable Memory for Human-Agent Interactions (155 attendees)
prompt:
I have an upcoming workshop titled "Agentic Memory Workshop – Modular, Portable Memory for Human-Agent Interactions" scheduled for October 16, 2025. This is a medium-complexity technical workshop that requires 60 days of preparation time.

Can you help me create a detailed workback plan that includes:
1. All key milestones leading up to the workshop
2. Specific tasks with owners and deadlines
3. Dependencies between tasks
4. Critical path activities
5. Risk mitigation strategies

Please consider:
- Identify and invite key speakers from research community (internal researchers, academic partners, industry experts)
- Determine workshop topics and session themes
- Speaker outreach and confirmation (at least 45 days before event)
- Abstract and presentation material submission deadlines
- Technical content review and feedback cycles
- Research presentations and demonstration materials development
- Participant invitation list and registration management
- Pre-reading materials preparation
- Interactive sessions and hands-on exercises preparation
- Technical setup for demos and live sessions
- Workshop agenda finalization and time allocation
- Post-workshop documentation and follow-up action items

Generate a comprehensive workback plan that ensures a successful technical workshop with the right speakers and compelling topics.
